time_markers.text: in the decade following the end of the Cold War
quotes: As United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees in the decade following the end of the Cold War, she faced daily the operational challenges of assisting millions of people forced to leave their homes.
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former South African President Nelson Mandela ( 1993)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former U.S. President Jimmy Carter (1994)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former Austrian Federal Chancellor Franz Vranitzky ( 1995)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former Philippine President Corazon C. Aquino (1996)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to Czech President Vaclav Havel ( 1997)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former Chilean President Patricio Aylwin Az6car ( 1998)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Mary Robinson ( 1999)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to former Finnish President Martti Ahtisaari (2000)
The J. William Fulbright Prize for International Understanding has been awarded to United Nations Secretary-General Kofi Annan (2001)

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: As United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees in the decade following the end of the Cold War, she faced daily the operational challenges of assisting millions of people forced to leave their homes.

organizations.name: Commission on Human Security
quotes: In her current roles as Co-chair of the Commission on Human Security and Special Representative of the Prime Minister of Japan for Afghanistan Assistance, she continues her lifelong work to protect and empower through humanitarian assistance and community development those suffering from conflict and deprivation and to advance international cooperation and peace.

organizations.name: Fulbright Association
quotes: In establishing the Prize, the Fulbright Association and its cooperating associates in the U.S. and abroad seek to recognize individuals who dedicate their energies to improving international understanding and to encourage new generations to undertake life commitments to international understanding.

roles.title: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
quotes: As United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees in the decade following the end of the Cold War, she faced daily the operational challenges of assisting millions of people forced to leave their homes.

roles.title: Special Representative of the Prime Minister of Japan for Afghanistan Assistance
quotes: In her current roles as Co-chair of the Commission on Human Security and Special Representative of the Prime Minister of Japan for Afghanistan Assistance, she continues her lifelong work to protect and empower through humanitarian assistance and community development those suffering from conflict and deprivation and to advance international cooperation and peace.
Headquartered in Washington , D.C., the Association has 42 chapters throughout the country that annually organize more than 125 educational and cultural programs.
